review: I love my fire stick! So many vintage films included with prime and the option to rent movies from prime is awesome.
author: Josh

review: THis product is terrible. I have an Apple TV in one room and this in the other. I am constantly having issues with the fire stick losing connection and getting stuck at 25%. I have tried everything... And I never have the issue with my Apple TV!!
author: jamie bond

review: Very easy to set-up and use.
author: Diane S.

review: Works as expected. Just expect a charges for most things
author: Hollee Goode

review: Why did I wait so long to get this.  So easy to use even the children think so ! Love this item
author: Karen McCleary

review: I love it!!!! It was fast and easy to set up, I use it everyday!!!
